answers.answer: Hello.In the absence of any other symptoms or concerns, I would like to think of the shoes. If the shoes are not fitting appropriately, there may be this discomfort.I guess you do not have this problem when you were the slippers.Try changing the shoes. At the same time, rule out diabetes or any lower back problem.Regards
I tried many shoes, so I don't think it is related to shoes.But I can make out that recently my left foot size is increased little bit. Will that be a problem ??
Hello.Have you shown the left foot to an orthopedician? Is it an overall increased size, a swelling or a bony growth? This is a bit unusual and should be investigated further.Regards
Hi,I haven't shown to any orthopedician. I guess its bony growth.Thanks

question: My problem is very peculiar, whenever I am sitting idle I feel heavyness in my left foot fingers ( not whole foot ). This happens if I am wearing shoes, if I take off my shoes then I don't feel that.I feel this way if and only if I am sitting idle and wearing shoes. Apart from that if I am walking or running I don't anything different.There is no mark or spot on my left foot.Another thing I feel this only on my left foot fingers, my right foot is perfectly fine.can someone please help. I am not able to wear shoes if I am sitting, I have to take it off.
title: Numbness / Heavyness in Left foot fingers
